name: github-to-deepwiki
description: Press 'Ctrl+Shift+d' to jump from github.com to deepwiki.com

scripts.package: rm -f pacakge.zip && pnpm build && zip -r package.zip . -x '.git/**' './node_modules/**' 'pnpm-lock.yaml' '*.ts' '.idea/**' 'tsconfig.json' 'package.json' '.gitignore' '.github/**'
